DOC.brief_summary: A cohort study Korean adult investigate biomarkers prediction cardiometabolic disease
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study Korean adult investigate biomarkers prediction cardiometabolic disease
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult without chronic disease Diabetic patient well controlled oral antidiabetic agent Hypertensive patient well controlled oral antihypertensive agent Dyslipidemic patient well controlled oral lipidlowering agent Malignancy Chronic waste disease Longterm steroid use
